name: I live next to a train track
name_original: I live next to a train track
description:
A short interactive fiction based on the fact I once work up in the middle of the night when track maintenance was being performed next to my home. This was a fun little experiment in using the Ink engine and exporting/modifying the existing html export to include sounds and colour changes. There is only one ending, but some things you do will persist throughout the story. 

Credits are at the end of the game.
